mapper.select: select seqno, title, writer, reg_date from (select rownum rn, seqno,title,writer, reg_date from (select seqno, title, writer, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') reg_date from mysweet_notice order by seqno desc) ) where rn > #{start} and rn < #{end}
select seqno,title,writer, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "reg_date", content from mysweet_bbs where seqno = #{id}
select pwd from mysweet_users where id=#{id}
